item.description: Scientific Publications 2024 (under review) Pederzani G., Grytsan A., Hoekstra A.G., Robertson A.M., Watton, P.N., Modelling Growth, Remodeling and Damage of a Thick-Walled Fibre-Reinforced Artery with Active Response: Application to Cerebral Vasospasm and Treatment, Computer Methods and Programs in Biomedicine, https://arxiv.org/abs/2408.17206 (under review) Laviola M., Pederzani G., Tsaneva K., Decoding Uncertainty for Clinical Decision Making, Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society A 2023 EDITH Consortium, EDITH Roadmap: Building the European Virtual Human Twin, https://zenodo.
